NCLDescriptor, NCLDescriptorSwitch
public interface NCLLayoutDescriptor<T extends NCLElement,El extends NCLLayoutDescriptor>
extends NCLElement<T>, NCLBindConstituent<T>

Interface that represents a layout descriptor. A layout descriptor can be a descriptor or a descriptor switch element.

Method Summary

Method Detail

findDescriptor

El findDescriptor(java.lang.String id)
                                              throws XMLException
Searches for a descriptor inside a descriptorSwitch and its descendants. The descriptor can be a descriptor or a descriptorSwitch.

Parameters:
id - id of the descriptor to be found.
Returns:
descriptor or null if no descriptor was found.
Throws:
XMLException

findDescriptor

El findDescriptor(java.lang.Object focusIndex)
                                              throws XMLException
Searches for a descriptor inside a descriptorSwitch and its descendants.

Parameters:
focusIndex - integer or string of the descriptor to be found.
Returns:
descriptor or null if no descriptor was found.
Throws:
XMLException
